body.name: Calphalon Coffee Maker, Programmable Coffee Machine with Glass Carafe, 14 Cups, Stainless Steel
features: TEMPERATURE PERFECTED: Combines high-performance heater that quickly heats water to the precise brewing temperature (between 195 and 205 degrees F), with a dual-insulated heating tube that maintains the optimal temperature throughtout the entire brewing cycle for the best coffee flavor.Filter type:Reusable
EVEN WATER DISTRIBUTION: Enlarged showerhead uniformly disperses water and saturates coffee grounds for optimal flavor extraction
CUSTOMIZE YOUR BREW: For stronger, bolder coffee, use the Strong Brew option for coffee that suits your tastes; to brew a smaller batch, choose the 1-4 cup option

EXPERTLY CRAFTED WARMING PLATE: Control warming plate temperature with low, medium, or high heat settings; durable, corrosion-resistant aluminum construction heats carafe evenly and keeps coffee maker looking like new for years to come
FULLY PROGRAMMABLE: Program brewing ahead of time with Brew Later feature, and choose when your machine turns off with Auto-Off Timer Selector
body.description: The Calphalon 14-Cup Programmable Coffee Maker is expertly designed to brew better tasting coffee at home. A high-performance heater and double-insulated water tubing ensure that coffee is brewed within the optimal temperature range (195 to 205 degrees F) for maximum flavor extraction. Brew up to 14 cups of great tasting coffee with the extra-large coffee carafe. Additional settings let you customize the brewing process: select Strong Brew to brew a bolder cup; choose from 3 heat settings to control warming plate temperature; Auto-Off Timer Selector lets you program when you want your machine to turn off. The ultra-durable and corrosion-resistant aluminum warming plate evenly heats the carafe, and keeps your machine looking like new for years to come. The decalcification sensor will illuminate to alert you when it’s time to clean it. Because great tasting coffee matters, make it with the Calphalon 14-Cup Programmable Coffee Maker.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Precision Control Temperature for Better Tasting Coffee The Calphalon 14-Cup Programmable Coffee Maker is expertly designed to deliver better tasting coffee. Temperature is key to extracting the most flavor from the coffee, and this coffee maker uses a high-performance heater and double-insulated water tubing to ensure that coffee is brewed at the optimal temperature, from start to finish. Enjoy expertly brewed coffee every day with the Calphalon 14-Cup Programmable Coffee Maker. Other Features: Strong Brew selector for a bolder, customized cup 1-4 cup setting adjusts brewing process to maximize flavor for smaller batches Adjustable warming plate lets you control temperature after brewing for up to 4 hours Expertly crafted aluminum warming plate is corrosion resistant Decalcification sensor illuminates when it’s time to clean the machine Auto-Pause feature lets you enjoy a cup before brewing is complete

Enjoy Expertly Brewed Coffee At Home Perfected Temperature Control High-performance heater quickly heats up water to the optimal brewing temperature, and the dual-insulated heating tube maintains the perfect temperature throughout the brewing cycle for the best coffee flavor. Enlarged Showerhead Uniformly disperses water and saturates coffee grounds evenly, for improved balance and full flavor extraction. Expertly Crafted Warming Plate Durable aluminum warming plate features High, Medium, and Low heat settings, and an adjustable 4-hour timer for customized heating control and consistently great taste. Customize Your Brew Select Strong Brew for bolder taste and flavor; experience exceptional flavor at any size with special 1-4 cup brew setting for smaller batches.

14-Cup Coffee Carafe Ergonomic 14-cup carafe is designed for precise pouring, right down to the last drop. Fully Programmable Program brewing ahead of time with Brew Later and choose when machine turns off with Warming Timer Selector. Enjoy a Cup Mid-Cycle Grab-and-Go Auto Pause halts brewing when carafe is removed, so you don't have to wait to enjoy a cup. Precision Cleaning Decalcification sensor illuminates to indicate that an Auto Clean Cycle should be run to maintain optimal performance.
More Quality Features Durable, reusable gold-tone filterCone-shaped brew basketAdvanced water filtration systemIncludes measuring scoop

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes the BEST coffee!!!
reviews.reviewText: Love this coffee pot. I don't buy the most expensive coffee or grind my own beans and the coffee still has the best flavor of any coffee pot I have had for years. The 4 hour warming plate plus the adjustable temperature of the plate is fantastic. I use 4 hours on medium and it never burns my coffee. I can't use the permanent filter, allergic to metal, but the paper work very well with this pot. The only problem I had was getting the amount of grounds correctly for the pot. Even the really strong coffee I made was good tasting and not bitter. LOVE THIS POT. Can't say enough about it. It is very good looking, just the right size and the pot is easy to handle. Broke my wrist and it gets picky with balance and has no problem lifting and pouring the pot. No drips when you pour. It does have a feature that I have never seen before. A rubber 'gasket' that goes above the pot to put the condensation back into the pot. That helps keep the coffee at the right mixture and was a very clever idea. I did learn that if you put the pot in the holder and turn the handle to the side it seats the gasket seats correctly every time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Coffee Maker !! NOT!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used this pot for almost 2 years. I love my Joe and have owned several pots. None compare. Excellent hot coffee with adjustment for strength, hot plate temp. And time. I’ve tossed my Brauns (had 4), cuisinart, Krups and Hamilton beach. When it dies I will get another. Heck I might just buy an extra one now.UpdateI bought 4 of these Calphalons. 2 burned out within a short time (months). I put the third into service. It leaked water from the bottom immediately. Makes great coffee but service life is very poor. Do not buy.I have a 30 year old Braun backup that I put back in service. Great pot, but only available on eBay. I ordered a cuisinart rapid brew today with a warranty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Warming plate cracked and carafe has persistent brown film
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this coffee maker on Jan. 10th 2024. Received a few days later and was looking forward to a new coffee maker since our old one started to leak. It was a Cuisinart 14 cup programable coffee maker. Used the new Calphalon coffee maker for about a week. While making a pot of coffee, there was this loud cracking noise. I checked the coffee maker and sure enough the warming plate ring had cracked. Seems to be a manufacturing defect since others have reported the same thing. Amazon replaced it and it should arrive today. Hope I have better luck with this one. Another problem I have is, that the carafe will not come clean. It has a brown film, from the coffee, that no matter how many times I wash it that haze is still there. Also, the carafe is very had to hand wash due to the pouring spot.Received the replacement coffee maker on Jan. 29th, 2024. Today is Feb. 11, 2024 and this morning while brewing a pot of coffee i once more heard a low crack and sure enough this coffee maker also cracked in the same place as the first one(the back rim of the warming plate. Not sure what I will do now. At least the carafe is able to come clean, unlike the 1st one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I ran a cycle of plane water, first. Then a pot of coffee full pot 12 cups. I used the same amount of coffee as my old coffeemaker, came out too strong. Then I made a full pot14cups, same amount of coffee, and it came out perfect flavor, and temp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Nice coffee maker, but no support or replacement filters
reviews.reviewText: When I bought this machine I was pleased with the quality and how well it brewed coffee, but after several weeks, the coffee brewing deteriorated, which I attributed to the charcoal filter. I found that there are no compatible filters on the market. The manual indicates that filters are available at calohalon.com, but they are not. After 30 minutes on the line with Calphalon’s service number, I was repeated put on hold while the representative attempted to provide me a source for the filters. The representative confirmed that the filters were not available at Calphalon.com and ultimately told me that the could be ordered from replacement parts.com for $15 each, but we’re on back order. She gave me a part number which does not appear on the site, I can neither confirm nor deny the availability. Even if they were available, that is an outrageous amount to spend on a filter that needs changing every 30 to 60 daysOverall I am extremely frustrated and would like to be rid of this machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I bought this Calphalon coffee maker to replace my old Calphalon I purchased almost 10 years ago. The old one still works like a charm. Still makes the best coffee ever! The only thing wrong with the old one is that the heating element stopped heating.I was so happy that I could still get this new Calaphon coffee maker. It was a great buy! It also works like a charm just like the as good as the one I purchased years ago. and so does the heating element as the older coffee had done in the past.Other reviews mention noise. I have great hearing and only thing I hear is a coffee maker that’s serious about making great coffee. I love how it sounds when it’s doing it’s job. It’s a good sound. But, then, I grew up in the age of the old-fashioned percolator. That was a good sound, too, in my opinion.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente!!! Muy bonita y combinable con la decoración de mi cocina
reviews.reviewText: Me gustó mucho. La compré para mí oficina y luce muy bien, además de su funcionalidad y un rico café caliente por horas.
